THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

ee
ope
Crl.MC.No.5641 OF 2019(&) 2 2020/KERI796
ORDER
Dated this the 8th day of January 2020

Petitioner is the accused in C.C. No.183/2018 on the files
of the Chief Judicial Magistrate Court, Kollam for having
allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 341,
323, 353, 294(b), 506(1) of IPC.

2. The de facto complainant and injured is the additional
2"? respondent. He is appeared through counsel and filed
affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably
settled and that he has no grievance against the petitioner.
There is also a counter case against the additional 2째째
respondent herein and others as C.C No.274/2018, which was
also settled between the parties. A report has been called for
from the investigating officer through the Senior Public
Prosecutor, There is no public interest involved. The
petitioner do not have any criminal antecedents.

In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire
proceedings in C.C No.183/2018 on the files of the Chief

Dae)

Manne

Bian

Crl.MC.No.5641 OF 2019(&) 3 2020/KERI796
Judicial Magistrate Court, Kollam stands quashed
